Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now.
Geofence service is not available now. Go to Settings>Location>Mode and choose High accuracy.
Your app has registered too many geofences.
You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call.

When signed in: 

• All your data is saved. 

• App preferences will be persisted across app installs.
When signing out: 

• All your data is removed and you have to begin the authentication process again
Logging in As an Admin means that you initially signed Up as an Admin

When you Sign in as an Admin,You will be responsible for handling orders from Customers. You will also be responsible for make sure deliveries are done.By Default you will be signed in as a a customer

You are Currently Signed in as an admin
Some things to Note,When signed in: 

• All your data is saved. 

• App preferences will be persisted across app installs.
When signing out: 

• All your data is removed and you have to begin the authentication process again
